N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4701.10 - Predetermined interval payments

State Regulations
A proper invoice submitted by the contractor shall be
required to initiate any payment, except where the contract provides that the
contractor will be paid at predetermined intervals without having to submit an
invoice for each such scheduled payment and, for the purposes of determining
eligibility for payment of interest and subject to the exception and
time-to-rectify provisions of sections 4701.7 and
4701.8
of this Part, the date by
which contract payment must be made in order for the authority not to become
liable for interest payments shall be the payment due date specified in
accordance with the contract. Notes
